content: Zebrafish can regenerate hearts. If a zebrafish has heart damage, it will immediately regenerate a new fruit instead.

Molluscs such as octopus, squid, starfish have up to three hearts, of which, two auxiliary hearts on both sides help mollusks absorb blood, and the central heart plays the role of regulator. secrete blood through arteries to feed your body.

Only female mosquitoes suck blood and male mosquitoes suck pollen or sap. Female mosquitoes do not suck human and animal blood to feed its body, but only use that amount of blood to produce. Specifically, once they have drained the blood, they will rest for 2-3 days to let the body produce protein, iron from the blood, then create amino acids and use it to create eggs.
